review: I was using regular Aleve, for muscle, knee & back pain,  it was not helping, I tried the aleve for muscle and back pain, a year ago, this is the only thing that has helped,  I have used it  one pill per day, ever since,  I have not even worn the knee bandage since, this is for me
It works great but gave me severe stomach cramps, pain, and general gastrointestinal distress.
